ngiemboon: Mǒonsê la fó kwòŋo témmó gie áa Mowab, ńkwɔ́ʼ tà ńkúu lekwɛ́ Nembo, éfó wó ńkwɔ́ʼ ńtyé ntoŋ sie lezíŋ ée lê Pisenga, é gwɔ́ á lélíe tÿǒsoŋo Yelíkò. Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gÿo, á pú ńgyá ngwòŋ ntsèm: léfó Ngalad, ńgʉa gʉa ńkúu Ndaŋ.
en: Then Moses went up from the plains of Moab to Mount Nebo, to the top of Pisgah,   which faces Jericho, and the Lord showed him all the land: Gilead as far as Dan,

ngiemboon: Ḿbú ńgyá pàga láʼa Nɛbtali ntsèm, á gwɔ́ jʉʼ ye Efalayîm pɔ́ Manase, ḿbú ńgyá jʉʼ ye Yúndà gie á gʉa gʉa ńkúu ntse máŋʉ́ Mendítèlane, á shÿó mbyěnèm.
en: all of Naphtali, the land of Ephraim and Manasseh, all the land of Judah as far as the Mediterranean   Sea,

ngiemboon: Ńgyá pàga láʼa Nengɛb, ńgyá fúʼu Yelíkò, ńgyá tÿǒsoŋo metÿǒon gie á gʉa gʉa, ńkúu Tsowa.
en: the Negev, and the plain in the Valley of Jericho, the City of Palms, as far as Zoar.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔɔn né Mǒonsê ngie: «Wɛ̌ ée ngwòŋ gẅie n da kaʼ tà ńkʉa lénáa mbwó Ábalaham, Ésàg, ńgÿo Yakwɔ̂b ńgɔɔn ngie: “N ge gÿo na ngwòŋ wɔɔn, á mbwó penkʉ́ pí;” n gÿǒ ɔ̀ lɔg nÿɔ́g mú ńgyá táʼ, ɔ̀ te kúu wó wɔ́.»
en: The Lord then said to him, “This is the land I promised Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, ‘I will give it to your descendants.’   I have let you see it with your own eyes, but you will not cross into it.”

ngiemboon: Áa jʉʼ gie Mǒonsê, ngàŋafàʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la kwé wó. Á tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Mowab páʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la gɔɔn.
en: So Moses the servant of the Lord    died there in the land of Moab, according to the Lord’s word.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a túŋo yé tsɛ̀ɛ fúʼ, á ngwòŋ Mowab á lélíe Mbɛ́d-Peyɔɔ. Tà ńkú lyɛ̌ʼɔɔn, nyìŋ laa zsé jʉʼ gie mé la túŋo yé wó wɔ́.
en: He buried him   in the valley  # 34:6 Nm 21:20 in the land of Moab facing Beth-peor, and no one to this day knows where his grave is.  # 34:6 Jd 9

ngiemboon: Mǒonsê la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ móm mbʉ́a nzèm nkÿo; ńgwaa kwé púʼu, mbà nÿɔ́g mé kaa kʉ́a, á piŋ ńnyé ńtʉte tʉte.
en: Moses was one hundred twenty years old when he died; his eyes were not weak, and his vitality had not left him.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ la lʉa Mǒonsê á kwòŋo témmó gie áa Mowab lʉa, na melyɛʼɛ́ láʼ móm tá. Ńzáʼ legwé.
en: The Israelites wept for Moses in the plains of Moab thirty days.   Then the days of weeping and mourning for Moses came to an end.  # 34:8 Mt 17:3

ngiemboon: Yǒonshûa míŋ Nûn la gẅiin zsénò tɛʼ, ńtí páʼ Mǒonsê la záb mbwó twó yé. Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ lɔ̌ɔn ńjúʼu ncwò wé; ḿbiŋe ńgÿo mmó gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la tsẅii mbwó Mǒonsê.
en: Joshua son of Nun was filled with the spirit of wisdom   because Moses had laid his hands on him.  # 34:9 Nm 11:16–30; 27:18; 1Sm 10:1,10; 16:13 So the Israelites obeyed him and did as the Lord had commanded Moses.  # 34:9 Nm 26:65; 27:15–23; 34:17; Dt 1:38; 3:28; 31:3–8,14–23

ngiemboon: Atsɔ̌ ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé páʼ Mǒonsê laa gíŋ ńkẅɛɛ tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Ésàlayɛ wɔ́; ńtí nue, Mǒonsê lɔ̌ɔn ńtyé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, tà pɔ́ yé ne ńgyáte tá shwóŋe.
en: No prophet has arisen again in Israel like Moses, whom the Lord knew face to face.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la túm pɔ́ yé, á gʉa ngwòŋ Egíbtò, ńgÿo menkʉ̀ʼʉ menò lâ menò mɔɔnmɔɔn, á mvfò Falahoŋ, á mvfò pʉ̀a pie ée tsɛ̀ɛ nɔʼ yé, tà mbɔɔ mvfò pʉ̀a láʼ pé ntsèm.
en: He was unparalleled for all the signs and wonders the Lord sent him to do against the land of Egypt #— #to Pharaoh, to all his officials, and to all his land #— #

ngiemboon: Mǒonsê la gẅiin máa ngùm, ḿbiŋe ńdɔgɔ nkʉ̀ʼʉ ngʉ̀ʼ tà ńgÿo shúm sie pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ntsèm lɔ́ɔn ḿbú ńgyá.
en: and for all the mighty acts of power and terrifying deeds that Moses performed in the sight of all Israel.
